full_summary:
### Humidity Cabinet #PW-22-01009417
#### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: 1000409094
* **Publication Date**: October 6, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 21, 2022

#### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements**: *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: To be determined
* **Expected Contract End Date**: To be determined
* **Contract Duration**: One (1) year from the date of contract award with an irrevocable option to extend for up to one additional year

#### Technical Requirement

* The Canada Border Services Agency requires the supply of Environmental Chamber - Humidity Cabinet off of Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI.

#### Tender Inquiry Contact

* **Name**: Anderson-Léger, Teagan
* **Email**: teagan.leger@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: 506-852-6975

#### Tender Packaging

* **Notice Document (English)**: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/06/4563e9598aa6aef7729b2d5437dbafc4/1000409094_-_npp.pdf ]
* **Notice Document (French)**: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/06/47b161e4b8d293f3f7b0399d7dbc3742/1000409094_-_npp_fr.pdf ]

---

#### Important Details

* The tender closing date is October 21, 2022, at 14:00 Eastern Time.
* The procurement is not limited to Canadian-based companies. However, only proposals from Canadian-based companies with the required technical and business capabilities will be accepted.
* All proposals must be received electronically through email. Hand-delivered or couriered proposals will not be accepted.
